Typography

Families, Weights, and Styles

Fira Sans

Light
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. Exercitation nisi anim do sit id do mollit dolor anim nisi fugiat magna occaecat.

Monospace

Regular
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. Reprehenderit in cupidatat duis consectetur minim non laboris nisi laboris. 
// change the font family
.my-serif-element {
    font-family: map-get($wk-font-stacks, global-serif);
}

.my-monospace-element {
    font-family: map-get($wk-font-stacks, monospace);
}

.my-sans-serif-element {
    font-family: map-get($wk-font-stacks, global-sans);
}
// change the weight
.my-light-element {
    font-weight: map-get($wk-font-weight, light); //only on Helvetica and Global Sans
}

.my-semi-bold-element {
    font-weight: map-get($wk-font-weight, semibold); //only Global Sans
}

.my-bold-element {
    font-weight: map-get($wk-font-weight, bold);
}
// straightforward italicization
.italicized {
    font-style: italic;
}

Headings

Heading Tags

Ullamco aliqua ullamco nostrud elit

Ipsum culpa in veniam voluptate

Excepteur laboris ad deserunt velit

Sit aute ea ea sint

Labore exercitation enim cillum excepteur
Ullamco ullamco sint esse ea

Generic <div> Headings

Esse ex labore esse irure
Excepteur culpa excepteur id exercitation
Cupidatat amet magna laborum officia
Incididunt id aute veniam pariatur
Tempor eu anim id nostrud
Esse est anim veniam anim 
<!-- heading tags -->
<h1>Minim consequat commodo cillum est 
</h1>
<h2>Ea incididunt nostrud quis eu 
</h2>
<h3>Dolor labore enim ut proident 
</h3>
<h4>Anim exercitation eu sit ad 
</h4>
<h5>Enim voluptate consequat deserunt occaecat 
</h5>
<h6>Adipisicing consequat ullamco culpa nisi 
</h6>
<!-- heading styles on any block element via classes -->
<div class="wk-h1">Proident nostrud nulla veniam consectetur 
</div>
<div class="wk-h2">Do cupidatat nisi pariatur excepteur 
</div>
<div class="wk-h3">Cillum proident consequat aute deserunt 
</div>
<div class="wk-h4">In reprehenderit ea aliqua adipisicing 
</div>
<div class="wk-h5">Tempor commodo irure ad commodo 
</div>
<div class="wk-h6">Velit officia ullamco laboris in 
</div>
// make your own heading element
.my-heading-element {
    @include wk-h1;
}

  5. Pariatur nostrud veniam velit et pariatur anim id amet ut.

<ul>
  <li>Consequat elit officia ipsum reprehenderit elit adipisicing cillum enim eu est ullamco do. 
  </li>
  <li>Mollit veniam et nulla ut laborum fugiat aute exercitation. 
  </li>
  <li>Magna nisi nulla ad laborum qui irure ut exercitation duis duis enim labore tempor consectetur. 
  </li>
  <li>Officia laboris id consectetur aliqua est occaecat mollit laborum consectetur officia commodo culpa exercitation. 
  </li>
  <li>Minim reprehenderit Lorem et cupidatat fugiat ullamco reprehenderit esse quis voluptate. 
  </li>
</ul>
<!-- just an ol -->
<ol>
  <li>Minim mollit commodo enim anim fugiat ex irure ad labore do excepteur irure adipisicing cillum. 
  </li>
  <li>Non quis fugiat id occaecat non fugiat adipisicing. 
  </li>
  <li>Eiusmod tempor duis minim officia do cillum in veniam ullamco eu dolore tempor sunt sunt. 
  </li>
  <li>Ea adipisicing irure non non consequat id non excepteur. 
  </li>
  <li>Reprehenderit nostrud quis pariatur ea aute incididunt est officia. 
  </li>
</ol>

Preformatted Text + Code

Code tag within a paragraph. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog 0123456789 Excepteur ea excepteur irure anim laborum in adipisicing. Dolor cillum anim non veniam mollit veniam consectetur officia anim laborum quis veniam sunt tempor. 

<p>Lorem ipsum<code>sample code</code>.</p>

Pre Default - horizontal scroll

Sunt fugiat qui nulla incididunt sint proident enim in anim eiusmod sunt sint do officia. Mollit aute et Lorem culpa velit voluptate aliqua ut reprehenderit magna magna. Eu cupidatat labore sint elit minim adipisicing in nulla non sint. 
<!-- allows horizontal scrolling -->
<pre>Nisi cillum occaecat in ad duis deserunt excepteur commodo quis sint excepteur quis nisi officia. </pre>

Pre Break Word

Aliqua et sunt adipisicing labore eu occaecat irure id aliquip tempor incididunt. Id dolore consectetur nisi culpa aliqua sit fugiat irure duis. Amet reprehenderit laboris sit cupidatat magna laborum cupidatat labore dolor quis excepteur aliqua voluptate. 
<!-- breaks words to avoid horizontal scrolling -->
<pre class="wk-code-block">Sint aute cillum do Lorem sint aute aute labore proident culpa. </pre>

<div class="wk-field-item">Field Item</div>

Blockquote

Dolor tempor cupidatat minim officia magna aliqua laborum velit ad ut irure Lorem ut adipisicing. Sit ut eiusmod nostrud veniam commodo Lorem ullamco. Nisi fugiat aliquip sint proident nisi consequat id voluptate proident ex. William Shakespere
